subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The fastest way for Johnny Damon to feel better, it seems, is to visit his chiropractor in Orlando, Fla. That is what he did Monday, after an earlier appointment to see a dentist, and the results had him feeling rejuvenated.
snippet: The fastest way for Johnny Damon to feel better, it seems, is to visit his chiropractor in Orlando, Fla. That is what he did Monday, after an earlier appointment to see a dentist, and the results had him feeling rejuvenated.
